content.p: Assistant Professor, Dr. Liew Kian Wah holds a BSc degree in mathematics from National Taiwan Normal University and has completed his PhD in the fields of probability and statistics at the University of Malaya. He is also a Financial Risk Manager certified by the Global Association of Risk Professionals. Subjects taught in the past: telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
